name: Mamie Taylor
description: For fortification, the Mamie Taylor relies on blended scotch, but while this dark spirit can evoke the cooler months, fresh lime juice lightens the spirit's ponderous demeanor, and a spicy ginger ale or ginger beer places it firmly in summer-cooler territory.
recipeIngredient: Ginger ale or ginger beer, the spicier the better

recipeInstructions.text: Fill an 8-ounce highball glass with ice and add scotch and lime juice. Fill with ginger ale or ginger beer and gently stir; garnish with a lime wedge.
